consistency_level="Strong") # To make vector search efficient, we need to create indices for the vector fields sparse_index = {"index_type": "SPARSE_INVERTED_INDEX", "metric_type": "IP"} col.create_index("sparse_vector", sparse_index) dense_index = {"index_type": "AUTOINDEX", "metric_type": "IP"} col.create_index("dense_vector", dense_index) col.load() # For efficiency, we insert 50
